patterns.text: We need to verify your identity. Please provide your phone number and the last 4 digits of your SSN to port your number to a new SIM card.
Your carrier account shows suspicious activity. We need to transfer your phone number to a new SIM card for security. Can you confirm your account PIN?
Click here to verify your phone number and receive your SMS verification code. This is required to secure your crypto wallet.
Your two-factor authentication has been disabled. To re-enable, please verify your phone number by clicking this link and entering the code we'll send via SMS.
URGENT: Your phone number will be deactivated in 24 hours. Call us immediately at this number to prevent service interruption and verify your account.
I noticed you have a large balance in your wallet. I can help you invest it safely. Send me your wallet address for a free consultation.
I've been tracking your transactions. You seem to be doing well. Want to join my exclusive trading group? Just send 0.1 ETH to verify.
Your wallet address 0x1234...5678 has been flagged for suspicious activity. Click here to verify your identity and avoid account suspension.
I see you just received a large transaction. Congratulations! I have an investment opportunity that could double your money. Interested?
Your wallet is being monitored by scammers. Send 0.05 ETH to this address to enable advanced security protection for your funds.
Your wallet address has been compromised. Send all your funds immediately to this secure address: 0x742d35Cc6634C0532925a3b844Bc9e7595f0bEb
We need to update your wallet address for security. Please send your funds to the new address: 0x8ba1f109551bD432803012645Hac136c22C9e7c
Your transaction failed. Please resend to this corrected address: 0x1234567890123456789012345678901234567890
Airdrop claim: Send 0.01 ETH to 0xABCDEF1234567890ABCDEF1234567890ABCDEF12 to receive 1000 tokens.
Your wallet needs verification. Send a small amount (0.001 ETH) to verify address: 0x9876543210987654321098765432109876543210.
Your MetaMask wallet has been locked due to suspicious activity. Click here to unlock and verify your seed phrase.
Congratulations! You've been selected for our exclusive NFT airdrop. Connect your wallet and claim your free NFT now!
Your DeFi protocol has been compromised. Withdraw all funds immediately to this secure address before they're lost forever.
We detected unauthorized access to your crypto exchange account. Click here to secure your account and verify your identity.
Your wallet needs to be upgraded to support the latest security features. Download this update and enter your private key to complete the upgrade.
wallet with zero balance but transaction history emptied wallet pattern
wallet with no transaction history completely inactive address
wallet only receiving transactions no outgoing activity accumulation pattern
wallet only sending transactions no incoming activity distribution pattern
wallet with very few transactions low activity pattern
wallet with high transaction frequency active trading pattern
wallet with large transaction amounts high value transfers
wallet with very small transaction amounts micro transactions pattern
wallet interacting with single address limited network pattern
wallet interacting with many addresses diverse network pattern
wallet with rapid sequential transactions automated trading pattern
wallet with slow transaction pattern infrequent activity
wallet relationships transaction flow suspicious connections
wallet stalking pattern monitoring other addresses tracking behavior
high value wallet large balance significant funds
wallet with very low balance minimal funds

risk_calculation.formula: Risk = (Qdrant Similarity × Multiplier) + (Matches × Bonus) + (Anomalies × Severity) + (Cluster × Weight)
